commonPitfalls: Not eliminating phone/internet during deep work (distractions kill flow)
Multitasking instead of single-tasking (focus on one thing at a time)
Not tracking output (measure progress, not just time spent)
Skipping meditation (focus training compounds productivity gains)
Working long hours instead of focused hours (90 min deep work > 4 hours distracted work)
Not protecting morning hours (mornings are non-negotiable productivity time)
